# Battle of the aous

#REDIRECT Battle of the Aous

---

## Battle of the Aous

Battle of the Aous or Aoos can refer to one of the following battles fought at or near the Ao√∂s river (modern Vjosa) in Epirus (modern Greece and Albania):
* Battle of the Aous (274 BC), between Epirus and Macedonia
* Battle of the Aous (198 BC), between Macedonia and the Romans
